feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Use Azure OpenAI to process podcast audio files
entry.summary: Learn how to create a podcast synopsis and localize it into multiple languages using AI and the required infrastructure to automate the required processes.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Guide to designing and developing a RAG solution
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when designing an LLM RAG solution, including determining what test documents and queries to use during evaluation, choosing a chunking strategy, determining what and how you should enrich the chunks, choosing the right embedding model, how to configure the search index, determining what searches you want to perform, and how to evaluate each step.

entry.title: Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture in an Azure landing zone
entry.summary: Learn how to build on the Azure OpenAI chat baseline architecture to address changes and expectations when you deploy it in an Azure landing zone.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunking phase
entry.summary: Learn about the various chunking strategies like boundary based, custom code, and document analysis models. Also learn about how the document structure should influence your chunking strategy.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Chunk enrichment phase
entry.summary: Learn about the importance of augmenting chunks with metadata like title, summary, keywords, entities, and more. Learn common cleaning operations you can perform on chunks that might improve vector matches.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Generate embeddings phase
entry.summary: Learn about why your choice of embedding model can affect your vector search results and read guidance on how to choose an embedding model.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Information retrieval phase
entry.summary: Learn about key decision points when you're configuring a search index. Learn about the various types of search you can perform such as vector, full text, hybrid, and hybrid manual. Finally, learn about breaking queries into subqueries, and why and how to rerank queries.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - LLM end to end evaluation phase
entry.summary: Learn about evaluating your RAG solution from end to end using key LLM and similarity metrics.

entry.title: Developing a RAG solution - Preparation phase
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when gathering test documents and queries. You use these artifacts to test and validate your chunking, information retrieval, and prompt engineering strategies.

entry.title: Guide to designing and developing a RAG solution
entry.summary: Learn what you should consider when designing an LLM RAG solution, including determining what test documents and queries to use during evaluation, choosing a chunking strategy, determining what and how you should enrich the chunks, choosing the right embedding model, how to configure the search index, determining what searches you want to perform, and how to evaluate each step.

entry.title: Choose an Azure service for vector search
entry.summary: Learn how to use this information to decide which Azure service for vector search best suits your application.

entry.title: Implement cross-tenant communication by using multitenant applications
entry.summary: Learn how to implement bidirectional, secure communications between services that are hosted in Azure subscriptions that different Microsoft Entra tenants manage.

entry.title: Access Azure OpenAI and other language models through a gateway
entry.summary: Learn about the challenges of directly accessing Azure OpenAI or other language models and how injecting a gateway lets you augment model usage with extra capabilities.

entry.title: Use a gateway in front of multiple Azure OpenAI deployments or instances
entry.summary: Learn how to add a gateway in front of multiple Azure OpenAI model deployments or instances.

entry.title: Use HDInsight and Delta Lake to manage event data
entry.summary: Ingest and process millions of streaming events per second with Apache Kafka, Apache Spark Structured Streaming, and Delta Lake.

entry.title: Baseline OpenAI end-to-end chat reference architecture
entry.summary: Learn about proven practices for building and deploying enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Hub-spoke network topology with Azure Virtual WAN
entry.summary: A hub-spoke reference architecture.

entry.title: Blue-green deployment of AKS clusters
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy AKS clusters using a blue-green strategy.

entry.title: Use Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with a multitenant Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.title: Deploy IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to run IBM Maximo Application Suite (MAS) on Azure. See guidance for designing and implementing cloud solutions with MAS 8.5 and up that use Azure.

entry.title: Securely managed web applications
entry.summary: Learn about deploying secure applications using the Azure App Service Environment, the Azure Application Gateway service, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: SAP deployment in Azure using an Oracle database
entry.summary: Learn proven practices for running SAP on Oracle in Azure, with high availability.

entry.title: Multiregion BCDR for Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: Learn which options and scenarios are possible to design and implement an effective multi-region BCDR strategy for Azure Virtual Desktop.

entry.title: Apache NiFi on Azure
entry.summary: Automate data flows with Apache NiFi on Azure. Use a scalable, highly available solution to move data into the cloud or storage and between cloud systems.

entry.title: Resiliency checklist for services
entry.summary: Resiliency is the ability to recover from failures and continue to function. Use this checklist to review the resiliency considerations for Azure services.

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Architecture
entry.summary: Second article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Deploy this scenario
entry.summary: Fifth article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: DR for Azure Data Platform - Scenario details
entry.summary: Third article in a series covering disaster recovery for an Azure data platform

entry.title: Extract, transform, load (ETL)
entry.summary: Learn about extract, transform, load (ETL) and extract, load, transform (ELT) data transformation pipelines, and how to use control flows and data flows.

entry.title: Choose a data storage technology
entry.summary: Compare big data storage technology options in Azure, including key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: N-tier application with Apache Cassandra
entry.summary: Deploy Linux virtual machines and a virtual network configured for an N-tier architecture with Apache Cassandra in Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra IDaaS in security operations
entry.summary: Learn how security operations teams can use Microsoft Entra identity and access features in an adaptive, integrated zero-trust security architecture.

entry.title: Migrate a web app by using Azure API Management
entry.summary: In this scenario, an e-commerce company in the travel industry uses Azure API Management to migrate a legacy web application.

entry.title: Enable the financial services risk lifecycle with Azure and R
entry.summary: Learn about risk calculations, which are pivotal at several stages in the lifecycle of key financial services operations.

entry.title: AKS triage—Workload deployments
entry.summary: Learn how to check whether workload deployments and DaemonSet features are running properly. This step is part of the triage practices for an AKS cluster.

entry.title: AKS triage—Node health
entry.summary: Learn about the triage step in which you examine the health of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and pods and resolve issues.

entry.title: Quarantine pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the quarantine pattern, which stops software from getting deployed to production until marked as trusted by an intermediary process.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline architecture on Azure
entry.summary: Architecture for a highly reliable workload that is accessed over a public endpoint and doesn't require private network connectivity to other company resources.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline architecture with network controls
entry.summary: Architecture for a highly reliable workload with enhanced network controls such as private endpoints.

entry.title: Employee retention with Databricks and Kubernetes
entry.summary: Learn how to build, deploy, and monitor a machine learning model for employee attrition that can be integrated with external applications using Databricks and Kubernetes.

entry.title: Big data analytics on confidential computing
entry.summary: Use confidential computing on Kubernetes to run big data analytics with Apache Spark inside confidential containers that are protected by Intel Software Guard Extensions with data from Azure Data Lake and Azure SQL Database.

entry.title: Automated API deployments using APIOps
entry.summary: Use APIOps with an Azure API Management instance to build and deploy APIs. This solution provides self-service tools, auditing, policy enforcement, and early feedback.

entry.title: Map requests to tenants in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for mapping requests to tenants in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Pricing models for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for planning pricing models for a multitenant solution.

entry.title: AKS triage—Cluster health
entry.summary: Learn how to check the overall health of an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster, as part of a triage step for AKS clusters.

entry.title: Quantum computing integration with classical apps
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Quantum to implement hybrid quantum applications

entry.title: Apache Sqoop migration to Azure
entry.summary: Learn about Apache Sqoop and about ways to migrate a Sqoop implementation to Azure by using Azure services like VMs, HDInsight and Data Factory.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Kubernetes node and node pool management
entry.summary: Understand Kubernetes nodes and node pools, how to handle Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) nodes and node pools, and node pool options for Amazon EKS and AKS.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.title: Build the second layer of defense with Microsoft Defender XDR Security services
entry.summary: Add additional security to your IT environment by using Microsoft 365 security service in addition to Azure security. This article is part of a series.

entry.title: Recover from loss of an Azure region
entry.summary: Design resilient, highly available, fault-tolerant applications and plan for disaster recovery.

entry.title: AKS day-2 guide: Patch and upgrade guidance
entry.summary: Learn about day-2 patching and upgrading practices for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) worker nodes and Kubernetes versions.

entry.title: Azure Well-Architected Framework review of an Azure NAT gateway
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for an Azure NAT gateway, based on the Azure Well-Architected Framework five pillars of architectural excellence.

entry.title: Related resources for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article provides a set of links and resources for architects and developers of multitenant solutions.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that are useful when working with multitenanted systems. It links to guidance and examples for how to use AKS in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: High availability and disaster recovery for IaaS apps
entry.summary: Learn about high-availability (HA) and disaster recovery (DR) options when deploying multitier infrastructure-as-a-service (IaaS) apps to Azure.

entry.title: Hybrid Cross-Cluster Scaling with Azure Arc for the workloads deployed on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Perform cross-cluster scaling of on-premises workloads by using Azure Arc, Traffic Manager, or Front Door and then deploy by using Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Valet Key pattern
entry.summary: Use a token or key that provides clients with restricted direct access to a specific resource or service.

entry.title: Large-scale custom natural language processing
entry.summary: Implement a custom natural language processing (NLP) solution in Azure. Use Spark NLP for tasks like topic and sentiment detection and analysis.

entry.title: Many models machine learning with Azure Machine Learning
entry.summary: Many machine learning problems are too complex for a single machine learning model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale with Azure Machine Learning.

entry.title: Many models machine learning with Spark
entry.summary: Often machine learning (ML) problems are too complex for a single ML model to solve. Learn about many models machine learning at scale in Azure with Spark.

entry.title: Customer lifetime value and churn prediction with Azure AI services
entry.summary: Learn how to create a solution for predicting customer lifetime value and churn using Azure Machine Learning.

entry.title: Migrate mainframe data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use RDRS, a mainframe data replication solution, to migrate data to and from multiple Azure data platform services.

entry.title: Supply chain management - Track and trace with Kaleido Blockchain as a Service powered by Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure services and Kaleido Blockchain as a Service to track and trace physical assets, along with their metadata.

entry.title: IBM z/OS mainframe migration with Avanade AMT
entry.summary: See how to use the Avanade Automated Migration Technology (AMT) framework to migrate IBM z/OS mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Use a split-brain DNS configuration to host a web app
entry.summary: Implement a split-brain DNS configuration to differentiate traffic treatment based on DNS and whether a client originates from the internet or a corporate network.

entry.title: Replatform AIX workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to replatform AIX workloads on Azure to reduce your TCO, improve business agility, and improve operational resiliency.

entry.title: Claim-Check pattern
entry.summary: Examine the Claim-Check pattern, which splits a large message into a claim check and a payload to avoid overwhelming a message bus.

entry.title: Azure mainframe and midrange architecture concepts and patterns
entry.summary: An overview of Microsoft's Azure mainframe and midrange architectural concepts and guidance offerings.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for .NET - Apply the pattern
entry.summary: Apply the reliable web app pattern for .NET to your web app. Find essential implementation guidance for migrating web apps to the cloud. Learn how to update (replatform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.summary: Plan the implementation of the reliable web app pattern for .NET. Find essential design guidance for migrating web apps to the cloud. Learn how to update (replatform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.summary: Apply the reliable web app pattern for Java to your web app. Find essential implementation guidance for web apps moving to the cloud. Learn how to update (replatform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.summary: Learn about the Reliable Web App pattern.

entry.title: Choreography pattern
entry.summary: Let each service decide when and how a business operation is processed, instead of depending on a central orchestrator.

entry.title: Sharding pattern
entry.summary: Use the Sharding design pattern to divide a data store into a set of horizontal partitions or shards.

entry.title: Unisys mainframe migration with Avanade AMT
entry.summary: Learn about options for using the Avanade Automated Migration Technology (AMT) Framework to migrate Unisys mainframe workloads to Azure.

entry.title: Azure file shares in a hybrid environment
entry.summary: With identity-based authentication, you can control access to Azure file shares by using Active Directory Directory Services users and groups.

entry.summary: Learn about an enterprise-level cloud file sharing solution that uses Azure Files, Azure File Sync, Azure Private DNS, and Azure Private Endpoint.

entry.title: Disconnected AI at the edge with Azure Stack Hub
entry.summary: Harness the power of edge AI when disconnected from the internet and move your AI models to the edge with a solution architecture that includes Azure Stack Hub.

entry.summary: Learn how to build, deploy, and manage high-quality models with Azure Machine Learning, a service for the end-to-end machine learning lifecycle.

entry.summary: Predict customer churn and find patterns in existing data associated with the predicted churn rate using Azure AI Platform.

entry.title: Customer support and feedback analysis
entry.summary: Use knowledge mining to help customer support teams quickly find answers to customer questions or assess customer sentiment at scale.

entry.title: Deploy AI and machine learning at the edge
entry.summary: Learn how to extend rapid machine learning inference from the cloud to on-premises and edge locations with Azure Stack Edge.

entry.summary: Learn how to apply the machine learning operations (MLOps) maturity model to implement a machine learning solution for predicting product shipping levels.

entry.summary: Use Azure network security capabilities, such as virtual networks, network peering, Private Link, and private DNS zones to protect MLOps solutions.

entry.summary: Implement query-based document summarization by using the Azure OpenAI GPT-3 model. Review two example use cases.

entry.summary: Bring your trained AI model to the edge with Azure Stack Hub and integrate it with your applications for low-latency intelligence.

entry.summary: Build and deploy a social medial analytics solution that uses Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure AI services with external data.

entry.summary: Learn how to build image processing into your applications by using Azure services such as the Computer Vision API and Azure Functions.

entry.summary: This article presents a reference architecture for serverless event ingestion and processing using Azure Functions.

entry.summary: This reference architecture shows a serverless web application, which serves static content from Azure Blob Storage and implements an API using Azure Functions.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches for supporting multitenancy in your IoT solution.

entry.summary: Architecture on Azure that shows a regulated environment for researchers to access sensitive data while providing a higher level of control and data protection.

entry.summary: Build a pipeline to transcribe and analyze audio conversations by using the AI Speech and Language APIs.

entry.summary: Compare options for building, deploying, and managing your machine learning models. Decide which Microsoft products to choose for your solution.

entry.summary: Learn about a single deployable set of repeatable, and maintainable patterns for creating machine learning CI/CD and retraining pipelines.

entry.summary: Implement a continuous integration (CI), continuous delivery (CD), and retraining pipeline for an AI application using Azure DevOps and Azure Machine Learning.

entry.summary: Find out how to automate video analysis. Use Computer Vision and Azure Machine Learning to analyze your content.

entry.summary: Build an automated document processing pipeline. Use AI Document Intelligence to extract data and natural language processing models to enrich the data.

entry.summary: Apply neural style transfer to a video using a convolutional neural network (deep learning) in an Azure Machine Learning pipeline with batch scoring.

entry.summary: Learn about common deployment scenarios for Microsoft Fabric.

entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to automate the renewal process for certificates issued by a non-integrated CA.

entry.summary: Azure Governance Visualizer Accelerator guidance to streamline the process of deploying and maintaining the Azure Governance Visualizer tool.

entry.summary: Deploy and run SWIFT Alliance Remote Gateway with Alliance Connect Virtual on Azure. Migrate or establish new SWIFT connectivity in Azure.

entry.summary: Learn about several options for moving, converting, transforming, and storing mainframe and midrange file system data on-premises and in Azure.

entry.summary: Get an overview of Azure virtual desktop technologies, guidance offerings, solution ideas, and reference architectures.

entry.summary: Design considerations for using the enterprise-scale Azure Virtual Desktop landing zone, which is part of the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure.

entry.summary: Learn about the different Azure database solutions described in Azure Architecture Center.

entry.title: Valet Key pattern
entry.summary: Use a token or key that provides clients with restricted direct access to a specific resource or service.

entry.summary: Learn how to create an infrastructure and workflow to ensure a valid digital evidence chain of custody (CoC) for computer forensics in Azure.

entry.summary: Details about the patterns and implementations used when the commercial software engineer team created the banking system cloud transformation solution.

entry.summary: Use Durable Functions, a feature of Azure Functions, as an automated document processing pipeline to classify documents by type.

entry.title: AWS to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Microsoft Azure services to Amazon Web Services (AWS) for multicloud solutions or migration to Azure.

entry.title: Design for self healing
entry.summary: Learn to design resilient applications that can recover from failures without manual intervention through self-healing.

entry.title: Use platform as a service (PaaS) options
entry.summary: Understand the difference between infrastructure as a service (IaaS) and platform as a service (PaaS). Learn how to swap IaaS components for PaaS solutions.

entry.title: Web API design best practices
entry.summary: Learn best practices for designing web APIs that support platform independence and service evolution.

entry.title: Web API implementation
entry.summary: Learn about best practices for implementing a web API and publishing it to make it available to client applications.

entry.title: Background jobs guidance
entry.summary: Learn about background tasks that run independently of the user interface, such as batch jobs, intensive processing tasks, and long-running processes.

entry.title: General considerations for choosing an Azure container service
entry.summary: Get a quick overview of common feature-level considerations that can help you choose an Azure container service. Part two of a series.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Troubleshoot network problems in AKS clusters
entry.summary: Learn about steps to take to troubleshoot network problems in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters.

entry.title: IPv6 hub-spoke network topology
entry.summary: Learn how to transition a hub-and-spoke network topology in Azure so it supports IPv6, which creates a dual-stack network.

entry.title: Health Endpoint Monitoring pattern
entry.summary: Implement the functional checks of the Health Endpoint Monitoring pattern. Use external tools to check apps at regular intervals through exposed endpoints.

entry.title: Index Table pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the Index Table pattern. Create indexes over the fields in data stores that are frequently referenced by queries.

entry.title: Leader Election pattern
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Leader Election pattern to coordinate the actions performed by a collection of collaborating task instances in a distributed application.

entry.title: Materialized View pattern
entry.summary: Generate prepopulated views over the data in one or more data stores when the data isn't ideally formatted for required query operations.

entry.title: Messaging Bridge pattern
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Messaging Bridge pattern to integrate disparate systems built on top of different messaging infrastructures.

entry.title: Pipes and Filters pattern
entry.summary: Break down a task that performs complex processing into a series of separate elements that can be reused or reordered.

entry.title: Priority Queue pattern
entry.summary: Prioritize requests sent to services so that requests with a higher priority are received and processed more quickly than those with a lower priority.

entry.title: Publisher-Subscriber pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the Publisher-Subscriber pattern, which enables an application to announce events to many interested consumers asynchronously.

entry.title: Quarantine pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the quarantine pattern, which stops software from getting deployed to production until marked as trusted by an intermediary process.

entry.title: Queue-Based Load Leveling pattern
entry.summary: Use a queue that acts as a buffer between a task and a service that it invokes in order to smooth intermittent heavy loads.

entry.title: Rate Limiting pattern
entry.summary: You can use a rate limiting pattern to help you avoid or minimize throttling errors.

entry.title: Retry pattern
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Retry pattern to enable an application to handle anticipated, temporary failures when the app tries to connect to a service or network resource.

entry.title: Scheduler Agent Supervisor pattern
entry.summary: Explore the Scheduler Agent Supervisor pattern, which coordinates a set of actions across a distributed set of services and other remote resources.

entry.title: Sequential Convoy pattern
entry.summary: The sequential convoy cloud design pattern allows for first-in-first-out processing of data in a serverless environment.

entry.title: Sharding pattern
entry.summary: Use the Sharding design pattern to divide a data store into a set of horizontal partitions or shards.

entry.title: Sidecar pattern
entry.summary: Deploy components of an application into a separate process or container to provide isolation and encapsulation.

entry.title: Static Content Hosting pattern
entry.summary: Deploy static content to a cloud-based storage service that can deliver them directly to the client.

entry.title: Strangler Fig pattern
entry.summary: Incrementally migrate a legacy system by gradually replacing specific pieces of functionality with new applications and services.

entry.title: Throttling pattern
entry.summary: Control the consumption of resources used by an instance of an application, an individual tenant, or an entire service.

entry.title: Intelligent e-commerce product search engine
entry.summary: This example scenario shows how using a dedicated search service can dramatically increase the relevance of search results for your e-commerce customers.
